scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && pnpm tsc -b && sh scripts/copyLocalProgramBinaries.sh
scripts.prepack: pnpm build && oclif manifest && oclif readme
scripts.kill: killall solana-test-validator || true && killall solana-test-val || true && sleep 1
scripts.test-cli: pnpm test-config && pnpm test-account && pnpm test-airdrop && pnpm test-shield && pnpm test-shield:sol && pnpm test-shield:spl && pnpm test-unshield && pnpm test-unshield:sol && pnpm test-unshield:spl && pnpm test-transfer && pnpm test-merkle-tree-authority && pnpm test-asset-pool && pnpm test-pool-type && pnpm test-merkle-tree && pnpm test-verifier && pnpm test-accept-utxos && pnpm kill
scripts.test-psp-init: cd .. && rm -r tmp-test-psp || true && ./cli/test_bin/run psp:init --path "./psp-template" --lspv "{ path = '../../../programs/psp4in4out-app-storage', features = ['cpi'] }"  --m "{ path = '../../../macros' }"  --lmtv "{ path = '../../../programs/merkle-tree', features = ['cpi'] }" --vsdk "{ path = '../../../verifier-sdk'}" tmp-test-psp && cd cli
scripts.test-psp-add-circuit: cd ../tmp-test-psp && ./../cli/test_bin/run psp:add-circuit second-circuit --circom && ./../cli/test_bin/run psp:add-circuit second-circuit1 && cd ../cli && ts-node scripts/checkAddCircuit.ts ../tmp-test-psp second-circuit true && ts-node scripts/checkAddCircuit.ts ../tmp-test-psp second-circuit1
scripts.test-psp-build: cd ../tmp-test-psp && npm i && ./../cli/test_bin/run psp:build tmp-test-psp && cd ../cli
scripts.test-psp: pnpm test-psp-init && pnpm test-psp-build && pnpm test-psp-test && pnpm test-psp-add-circuit
scripts.test-circom-init: cd .. && rm -r tmp-test-circom || true && ./cli/test_bin/run circom:init  tmp-test-circom --path "./psp-template"  && cd cli
scripts.test-circom-add-circuit: cd ../tmp-test-circom && ./../cli/test_bin/run circom:add-circuit second-circuit && cd ../cli && ts-node scripts/checkAddCircuit.ts ../tmp-test-circom second-circuit true
scripts.test-circom-build: cd ../tmp-test-circom && npm i && ./../cli/test_bin/run circom:build tmp-test-circom && cd ../cli
scripts.test-circom: pnpm test-circom-init && pnpm test-circom-build && pnpm test-circom-test && pnpm test-circom-add-circuit
scripts.test: pnpm kill && pnpm test-cli && pnpm test-psp && pnpm test-circom
scripts.install-local: pnpm build && pnpm global remove @lightprotocol/cli || true && pnpm global add $PWD
